##### Load packages

# For importing SPSS files

##### Load dataset of all waves (not included on Github) and remove missing values

##### Wave 1
data_wave1_in <- read.spss('L_CoronaMelder_wave1_3p.sav', to.data.frame=TRUE, use.missings=FALSE)
# Filter out the respondents that did not complete the entire survey 
data_wave1 <- data_wave1_in[!is.na(data_wave1_in$duur),]
data_wave1['wave'] <- 1

## Calculate mean scores on the different factors
# UTAUT: Performance expectancy
data_wave1$PE1_UTAUTn <- as.numeric(data_wave1$PE1_UTAUT)
data_wave1$PE2_UTAUTn <- as.numeric(data_wave1$PE2_UTAUT)
data_wave1$PE_UTAUT <- rowMeans(data_wave1[, c("PE1_UTAUTn", "PE2_UTAUTn")], na.rm = TRUE)

psy::cronbach(data_wave1[, c("PE1_UTAUTn", "PE2_UTAUTn")])
hist(data_wave1$PE_UTAUT)


# UTAUT: Effort expectancy (users)
data_wave1$EE1a_UTAUTn <- as.numeric(data_wave1$EE1a_UTAUT)
data_wave1$EE2a_UTAUTn <- as.numeric(data_wave1$EE2a_UTAUT)
# Since the item EE2a_UTAUT is positively phrased, it will be reverse coded such that higher numbers refer to higher EE
data_wave1$EE2a_UTAUTn_r = car::recode(data_wave1$EE2a_UTAUTn, '1=7; 2=6; 3=5; 4=4; 5=3; 6=2; 7=1')
data_wave1$EEa_UTAUT <- rowMeans(data_wave1[, c("EE1a_UTAUTn", "EE2a_UTAUTn_r")], na.rm = TRUE)

psy::cronbach(data_wave1[, c("EE1a_UTAUTn", "EE2a_UTAUTn_r")])
hist(data_wave1$EEa_UTAUT)


# UTAUT: Effort expectancy (non-users)
data_wave1$EE1b_UTAUTn <- as.numeric(data_wave1$EE1b_UTAUT)
data_wave1$EE2b_UTAUTn <- as.numeric(data_wave1$EE2b_UTAUT)

psy::cronbach(data_wave1[, c("EE1b_UTAUTn", "EE2b_UTAUTn_r")])
hist(data_wave1$EEb_UTAUT)

data_wave1$EE_UTAUT <- rowMeans(data_wave1[, c("EE1_UTAUT", "EE2_UTAUT")], na.rm = TRUE)

hist(data_wave1$EE_UTAUT)

# Graph with all respondents (1900) and their status over time
status_all_overview <- data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_wave1$nomem_encr), wave = 1)
status_all_overview <- rbind(status_all_overview, data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_wave1$nomem_encr), wave = 2))
status_all_overview <- rbind(status_all_overview, data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_wave1$nomem_encr), wave = 3))
status_all_overview <- rbind(status_all_overview, data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_wave1$nomem_encr), wave = 4))
status_all_overview <- rbind(status_all_overview, data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_wave1$nomem_encr), wave = 5))
status_all_overview <- rbind(status_all_overview, data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_wave1$nomem_encr), wave = 6))

status_all_overview$status <- NA

datas <- list()
datas[[1]] <- data_wave1
datas[[2]] <- data_wave2
datas[[3]] <- data_wave3
datas[[4]] <- data_wave4
datas[[5]] <- data_wave5
datas[[6]] <- data_wave6

for (row in 1:nrow(status_all_overview)) {
  wave <- status_all_overview[row,]$wave
  thedata <- datas[[wave]]
  
  if (!status_all_overview[row,]$nomem_encr %in% datas[[wave]]$nomem_encr) {
    status_all_overview[row,]$status = 'dropout'
  }
  else {
    if (thedata[thedata$nomem_encr == status_all_overview[row,]$nomem_encr,]$Behavior_UTAUT == "Ik heb de CoronaMelder app in het verleden wel gebruikt maar op dit moment niet meer") {
      status_all_overview[row,]$status = 'former_user'
    }
    else if (thedata[thedata$nomem_encr == status_all_overview[row,]$nomem_encr,]$Behavior_UTAUT == "Ik heb de CoronaMelder app nooit gebruikt") {
      status_all_overview[row,]$status = 'never_used'      
    }
    else if (thedata[thedata$nomem_encr == status_all_overview[row,]$nomem_encr,]$Behavior_UTAUT == "Ik gebruik de CoronaMelder app op dit moment") {
      status_all_overview[row,]$status = 'user'      
    }
  }

}

# Graph with participants and how their status changed through the six waves
status_overview <- data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_complete$nomem_encr), wave = 1)

status_overview <- rbind(status_overview, data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_complete$nomem_encr), wave = 3))

status_overview <- rbind(status_overview, data.frame(nomem_encr = unique(data_complete$nomem_encr), wave = 6))

status_overview$status <- NA

# Status can be:
# 1. Did not start using app yet
# 2. Using app
# 3. Former user of app
# 4. Quit the study

for (row in 1:nrow(status_overview)) {
  if (min(data_complete[data_complete$nomem_encr == status_overview[row,]$nomem_encr,]$wave) > status_overview[row,]$wave) {
    status_overview[row,]$status = 'not_start'
  }
  else if (max(data_complete[data_complete$nomem_encr == status_overview[row,]$nomem_encr,]$wave) < status_overview[row,]$wave) {
    if (max(data_complete[data_complete$nomem_encr == status_overview[row,]$nomem_encr,]$event) == 1) {
      status_overview[row,]$status = 'former_user'
    }
    else {
      status_overview[row,]$status = 'dropout'
    }
  }
  else {
    if (data_complete[data_complete$nomem_encr == status_overview[row,]$nomem_encr & data_complete$wave == status_overview[row,]$wave,]$event == 1) {
      status_overview[row,]$status = 'former_user'
    }
    else {
      status_overview[row,]$status = 'user'
    }
  }
}

status_overview %>% group_by(status, wave) %>% summarise(total = n() / 762 * 100) %>% ggplot(aes(fill=status, y = total, x = wave)) + geom_bar(position="stack", stat="identity",width = 0.5) + scale_fill_discrete(name = 'Status', labels = c('Gestopt met de studie', 'Voormalig gebruiker', 'Nog niet gestart met gebruik', 'Huidig gebruiker'), type=c('#4D4C4C', '#F8766D', '#9B9B9B', '#619CFF')) +

# Attrition curve and 'usage half-life' (cf. Eysenbach, 2005)
attrition_curves = data.frame(unique(data_complete$month))
attrition_curves$dropout <- NA
attrition_curves$stopusing <- NA
attrition_curves <- attrition_curves[order(attrition_curves$unique.data_complete.month.),]
num_stopped <- 0
num_dropout <- 0

dropout_data = data.frame(unique(data_complete$nomem_encr))
dropout_data$lastmonth <- NA
dropout_data$lastwave <- NA

dropout_data <- dropout_data[!dropout_data$unique.data_complete.nomem_encr. %in% unique(filter(data_complete, event == 1)$nomem_encr),]

for (row in 1:nrow(dropout_data)) {
  dropout_data[row,]$lastmonth <- max(data_complete[data_complete$nomem_encr == dropout_data[row,"unique.data_complete.nomem_encr."],]$month)
  dropout_data[row,]$lastwave <- max(data_complete[data_complete$nomem_encr == dropout_data[row,"unique.data_complete.nomem_encr."],]$wave)  
}

dropout_data <- dropout_data[dropout_data$lastwave != 6,]

for (row in 1:nrow(attrition_curves)) {
  month <- attrition_curves[row,]$unique.data_complete.month.
  num_stopped <- num_stopped + nrow(data_complete[data_complete$month == month & data_complete$event == 1,])
  attrition_curves[row,]$stopusing <- (762 - num_stopped) / 762 * 100
  
  if (row == 1) {
    attrition_curves[row,]$dropout <- (762 - num_stopped) / 762 * 100
  }
  else {
    attrition_curves[row,]$dropout <- (762 - num_stopped - nrow(dropout_data[dropout_data$lastmonth < month,])) / 762 * 100
  }
}
